result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lynn D Stokes

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lynn D Stokes not in court, in custody.  Attorney Jade K Hall in court for Lynn D Stokes.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Status conference held.  Atty. Hall requests another status date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom.
Status conference scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Lynn D Stokes not in court, in custody. Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Matter set for pre-trial conference. Defendant qualified for public defender representation but one has not been appointed. Case adjourned to Branch 1.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Oral No Contact Order with AMM.

Defendant Lynn D Stokes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia appeared by video for Lynn D Stokes.  Attorney Peter Cannon appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live at the Court's discretion on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
